description: Raging Stallion Studios is proud to present Eric Evans in hisfinal movie. That's right, he has now retired from the industry.And what a shame! He never looked better, and we here at RagingStallion are all thankful that we had the chance to work with Eric overthe years. He is one of porn's greatest performers! (If you want tocheck him out in one of his first films - nearly ten years ago - checkout Measuring Up, now available on our website!). If there everwas a leather/muscle fantasy, this solo is it. It looks and feels just likethose old loops from the 1970s - all about male perfection!
title: Studs
